hints.content:
$30$ participants did not receive cold medicine and did not have their cold for longer than $7$ days.

 | Received cold medicine | Did not receive cold medicine
- | :-: | :-: | :-:
**Cold lasted longer than $7$ days**  | $?$| $?$ 
**Cold did not last longer than $7$ days** | $?$ | $30$

| Received cold medicine | Did not receive cold medicine
- | :-: | :-: | :-:
**Cold lasted longer than $7$ days**  | $23$| $20$ 
**Cold did not last longer than $7$ days** | $27$ | $30$

question.content:
The Cold Be Gone Company conducted a study where $100$ participants were assigned to either receive a cold medicine or not receive a cold medicine. The Cold Be Gone Company then recorded whether the participant's cold lasted $7$ days or longer. The Venn diagram below shows their data.



**Complete the following two-way frequency table.** 

 | Received cold medicine | Did not receive cold medicine
- | :-: | :-: | :-:
**Cold lasted longer than $7$ days**  | [[☃ numeric-input 1]]| [[☃ numeric-input 2]] 
**Cold did not last longer than $7$ days** | [[☃ numeric-input 3]] | [[☃ numeric-input 4]] 

![A Venn Diagram has 2 overlapping groups, Cold Medicine, 27, and Cold Longer than 7 Days, 20. The overlapping area shared by both groups contains 23. The area not included in any group contains the number 30.](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1d55bdfd9493be7fba40577ed51b2f13d242ad63.png)
